scripts.junta_gera_rel: npm run junta-json && npm run gera-rel-html
scripts.test_prod: npx cypress run -b chrome --spec cypress/integration/GUI/*.js --env configFile=prod --env config.env.db=prod --reporter mochawesome
scripts.test_login_prod: npx cypress run -b chrome --spec cypress/integration/GUI/login_spec.js --env configFile=prod config.env.db=prod --reporter mochawesome
scripts.test_login_stage: npx cypress run -b chrome --spec cypress/integration/GUI/login_spec.js --reporter mochawesome
scripts.test_checklist_prod: npx cypress run -b chrome --spec cypress/integration/GUI/checklist_spec.js --env configFile=prod --reporter mochawesome
scripts.test_checklist_stage: npx cypress run -b chrome --spec cypress/integration/GUI/checklist_spec.js --reporter mochawesome
scripts.test_agendamento_prod: npx cypress run -b chrome --spec cypress/integration/GUI/agendamento_spec.js --env configFile=prod --reporter mochawesome
scripts.test_e2e_consulta_pres_prod: npx cypress run -b chrome --spec cypress/integration/GUI/E2E_consulta_presencial_spec.js --env configFile=prod --reporter mochawesome
scripts.test_busca_profissional_prod: npx cypress run -b chrome --spec cypress/integration/GUI/busca_profissional_spec.js --env configFile=prod --env config.env.db=prod --reporter mochawesome
scripts.testC: npx cypress run -b chrome --spec cypress/integration/GUI/*.js --reporter mochawesome
scripts.testC_hl: npx cypress run --headless -b chrome --spec cypress/integration/GUI/*.js --reporter mochawesome
scripts.testF: npx cypress run -b firefox --spec cypress/integration/GUI/*.js --reporter mochawesome
scripts.testF_hl: npx cypress run --headless -b chrome --spec cypress/integration/GUI/*.js --reporter mochawesome
scripts.clean_all: npm run clean_reports && npm run clean_screenshots && npm run clean_videos
